DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: Virgin Records Chief Gets Senior EMI Post : Ken Berry has been named to the new post of president and chief_executive for EMI Records Group International effective Sept . 1 . Berry will continue as chairman and chief_executive of EMI ' s Virgin Music Group , adding the job of overseeing EMI Music ' s recorded music operations outside of the United States and Canada . Separately , EMI Music announced its profit in the fiscal_year ended March 31 increased by 25 % to $ 364 million , while sales rose 16.8 % to $ 2.6 billion .
